articles.author: Alex Malcolm
articles.title: After a tough year, Green returns to 'natural game' at No. 4 in Australia's Test side - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: With Smith slated to open, Green will bat at No. 4 where he averages 65.09 in 24 Sheffield Shield innings and 66.03 in his last 38 Shield innings
articles.content: Cameron Green: "I feel like No.4 is my natural game, where I can take my time and get myself in"  •  Getty Images
